ENTRADAS:
00
01
10
11

SALIDAS:
00000000101000100
11110011000110000
11001111000100000
00001111000000000


=======SWICTH VHDL==========
when "00" => display <= "00000000101000100";
when "01" => display <= "11110011000110000";
when "10" => display <= "11001111000100000";
when "11" => display <= "00001111000000000";
